Subskills.name: Arrow to the Knee
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by arrow rampage.

Subskills.name: Spinning Shrapnel
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to sling the arrow in the air spinning and dropping back dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Marked For Destruction
Subskills.description: Arrow rampage now spawns from all directions flying towards target area for an extended period of time. Cooldown is increased.

Subskills.name: Bigger is Better
Subskills.description: Chance to increase arrow size and area of effect of arrow rampage.

Subskills.name: Critical Hit
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike chance when using arrow rampage.

Subskills.name: Crucial Strike
Subskills.description: Increased critical strike damage dealt by arrow rampage.

Subskills.name: Fiery Rain of Arrows
Subskills.description: Arrow rampage area becomes much wider and deals a portion of its damage as fire causing burning on monsters hit based on fire damage dealt.

Subskills.name: Arcanum Arrow
Subskills.description: Increases the arcane damage dealt by arrow rampage.

Subskills.name: Blast Wave
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Tricky Tactics
Subskills.description: Arrow rampage projectiles have a chance to cast trickshot when hitting a monster.

Subskills.name: Arrow Mayhem
Subskills.description: Arrow rampage projectiles have a chance to shatter into a spread of arrows when hitting a target.
